item.title: Research
item.description: Research Projects Besides their final thesis project, MSNE students spend 15 weeks on additional two research projects over the course of their studies. In our blog post, Pranshul, Annika and Vanessa write about their experiences at UC Davis, the Max Planck Institute for Intelligent Systems and MIT. Retreats 1st MSNE Retreat 2017. Invited Speakers: Matthias Bethge, Heiko Neumann, Dmitry Kireev 2nd MSNE Retreat 2018. Invited Speakers: Jakob Macke, Benjamin Grewe, Thomas Euler Conference Visits 2018 13th Bernstein Conference GÃ¶ttingen 2nd HBP Student Conference Interdisciplinary College CoC Neuroengineering Workshop Munich Conference on Clinical Neurotechnologies and Healthy Aging 2017 1st HBP Student Conference Events (Co-) Organized by MSNE Students RoboCare - Future of Care between Human and Machine Workshop on Learning in Brains and Machines
